name: Picreate – My Uncle’s Lost Photos
description:
Picreate is a social photography game to be played during video conferences by four or more players. 

The players try to recreate images based on descriptions with objects they find at home (or wherever they are during the video conference). When time is up, the original image is revealed and the players vote in a variety of categories.

SPOILER WARNING: Please do not look at the other slides before playing – this might spoil the play experience.
